message:
Set up repository structure

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1097015 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Initial commit.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131516 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Zookeeper added to third party. configure.ac and configure will run the zookeeper configure. Added code for leader election in C++. Makefile.in updated to compile with the Zookeeper libraries.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131517 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Master now registers with ZooKeeper. Slaves find master in Zookeeper. If new master elected, slaves switch over to it

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131518 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Leader election message added

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131519 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

slave_id in the C API also uses strings (char *)

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131520 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

C API Slave ID changed to C string

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131521 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

SlaveID and slave_id should now always be strings

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131522 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Offer ID changed to strings (preparation for prefixing with master id)

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131523 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Task ID and Framework ID also converted to strings

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131524 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updates to get Nexus running on Mac OS X.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131525 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a configure for Mac OS X.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131526 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removing libev-3.8/config.h that by accident got committed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131527 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Instead of updating lots of files, we can just pass -DXOPEN_SOURCE to each building command line.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131528 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Oops, missed removing a few _XOPEN_SOURCE defines from earlier.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131529 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

a) introduced master id as a node's zk sequence (0 if not in FT mode) b) prefixed offer-id, framework-id, slave-id with masterId- c) changed some counters to longs

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131530 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Temporary fix for infinite loop caused by the error callback calling stop, calling the error callback (nexusproject/nexus#14).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131531 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

On Mac OS X the implementation of inet_ntoa is not thread-safe (POSIX doesn't require it to be thread safe) and this can cause a bug (you'll get a string representation of a PID with '[inet_ntoa error]').

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131532 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

make etags; Now creates src/TAGS for all C/CPP code

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131533 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed code to use BOOST

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131534 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Remove Impact as an alternative for web UI title font. Closes #12.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131535 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

All tests now work. TaskIds are ints again.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131536 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Special message to restore state. Now updates resourcesInUse state which was previously lost

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131537 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed build issue for Mac OS X so that we can actually run Java.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131538 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Generated a new configure with autoconf

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131539 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixup bottle TEMPLATE_PATH and get ui working again.
Tested by running ./src/nexus-master and ./src/nexus-slave and successfully browsing :8080 and :8081.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131540 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Merged two repeated data structures called Task inside master.hpp and slave.hpp into one TaskInfo now residing in internalinfo.hpp. The tasks datastructure inside the slaves variable inside the master.cpp is now restored when a new master takes over.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131541 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Ignore .dSYM files created on OS X

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131542 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Add *.dylib to .gitignore (for OS X)

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131543 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Slave now parses URLs of the form zoo:// or nexus:// to tell if fault-tolerant mode or not

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131544 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

bug: extra code that wasn't deleted

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131545 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a URL processor that currently understands nexus://<master> zoo://<zoosvr1>,<zoosvr2>... and zoofile://<filename>, where filename contains one ip:port to zooservers per line

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131546 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a bug introduced in API refactoring whereby framework messages
were no longer automatically having their slaveID set by the slave. This
was causing a crash in Hadoop (GH-16).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131547 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Set Google log directory to /tmp in order to have it work even on
platforms where glog does not know the name of the temp directory.
Closes #15, though log location should eventually be configurable.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131548 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Created RAII Lock class to replace duplicate ones in nexus_sched and
nexus_exec.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131549 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Some code cleanup in nexus_sched implementation:
- Renamed some variables and functions that had different names back
  when SchedulerDriver was called Scheduler.
- Use newly added Lock class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131550 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fix a bug in C API that didn't report executor correctly (due to driver
parameter being added to getExecutorInfo and getFrameworkName). Also
improved the reporting of this condition by making it call error().

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131551 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fix unit tests after commit c1827f9e9cef5275b99b96705a23ad1869c90774

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131552 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Initial work on adding drivers to API (#6); frameworks not yet updated

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131553 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated frameworks to use driver API. Also implemented proper
referencing of executor in Java and Python.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131554 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Rename Executor::startTask to launchTask (ticket #23).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131555 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Make EC2 scripts check out code from GitHub. Closes #8.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131556 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Make HDFS use all disk drives on EC2 nodes. Closes #7.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131557 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1) URL processor refactored 2) schedulers now use leader detection and reconnect to master 3) files renamed according to our conventions

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131558 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

typo fixed to make it compile

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131559 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Typos fixed

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131560 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

typo

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131561 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Slaves and schedulers now re-register with their old id with the new master

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131562 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

tasks for frameworks now updated whenever a slave or framework reconnects

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131563 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a bug that would create a new isolation module upon master reconnect

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/mesos/trunk@1131564 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
